Email 1.subject: Matpers EDC 200 - Raw Material Documentation Checklist

body.text:
Good morning,

Please complete the attached Raw Material Documentation Checklist for Matpers EDC 200.
Each applicable document should be marked as “Attached” on the checklist and also provided as an individual file. Please do not send zipped folders, as our system cannot accept them. If any item does not apply, simply check “N/A.”
We kindly ask that documents be the most current available, ideally dated 2025 or later. Once complete, return the checklist along with all applicable documentation.
In addition, we would appreciate a 16 oz sample of the product with the corresponding COA, addressed to:
Marco Antonio Gutierrez II
750 Oakwood Road
Lake Zurich, IL 60047
Thank you for your assistance, and feel free to reach out with any questions.

Marco Antonio Gutierrez II

Regulatory Compliance Manager


750 Oakwood Road

Lake Zurich, IL 60047

Direct: 708.731.2830

Office: 708.345.5200

Fax: 708.345.4005

mgutierrez@Kraftchemical.com<mailto:kgruber@Kraftchemical.com>

www.kraftchemical.com<https://protect2.fireeye.com/v1/url?k=76ecb268-13a10bfd-76eb968d-000babff41af-e079ca7583fb38bd&q=1&e=d89cf333-8840-47f3-be52-3dcc82fd9431&u=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.kraftchemical.com%2F>



[X]



Cook+Thurber NSF International

Audited to a Certificate of Completion: GMP,Codex/NACMCF HACCP and Best Industry Practices

ISO9001:FS80057

FDA Registrar Corp/ISO Certified



CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE:  The contents of this email message and any attachments are intended solely for the addressee(s) and may contain confidential and/or privileged information and may be legally protected from disclosure. If you are not the intended recipient of this message or their agent, or if this message has been addressed to you in error, please immediately alert the sender by reply email and then delete this message and any attachments. If you are not the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that any use, dissemination, copying, or storage of this message or its attachments is strictly prohibited.
